column1: Local Foods////I decided to try something different for lunch today
column2: and I was not disappointed! The menu is plain and simple
column3: making sure any choice you make for your meal hard to disappoint you. I had the highly rated crunchy chicken sandwich with a choice of two sides of which I chose the Tuscan Kale
column4: and homemade chips. Everything was DELICIOUS. You get A LOT of food; however
column5: I had that awkward amount of food where its too much to finish it all but too little to take to go.
